tutorial.speak:
To record attendance, start by clicking on the Group icon and selecting one of your groups.
Navigate to the Sessions tab.
Click the New button to create a new session.
Add a session date. You can add multiple session dates for the class. After saving, select a session from the dropdown menu.
Add the class members who are present for that day's session.
To view attendance reports, click on the Attendance icon, select Group Attendance, set your desired filters, and click Run Report.
